entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
